Package com.flipkart.dao

Class GymCentreDAO

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.GymCentreDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
GymCentreInterfaceDAO
public class GymCentreDAO extends Object implements GymCentreInterfaceDAO
DAO class for handling operations related to gym centers in the Flipkart system.

    • validateGymCenter

      public void validateGymCenter(String gymCentreId, int isApproved)
      Approves or rejects a gym center by updating its approval status.
      Parameters:
      gymCentreId - ID of the gym center
      isApproved - Approval status (1 for approved, 0 for pending, 2 for rejected)
